title: Waiting for Fidel
creator_credit: Michael Rubbo, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Joseph Smallwood, former Newfoundland Premier, Geoff Stirling, radio and television station owner, and Michael Rubbo, NFBC film director, visit Cuba to make a film in which they hope Fidel Castro will star. As they await Castro they look at Cuba and the film shows what they discover.
